title: Data file
description: Schema for submitting metadata for a data file.

file_format.title: File format
file_format.comment: Not all of the types are valid for new submissions, but are present for historical purposes.

output_type.title: Output type
output_type.description: A description of the file's purpose or contents.

paired_end.title: Paired End Identifier
paired_end.description: Which pair the file belongs to (if paired end library)

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: The experiment or dataset the file belongs to.
dataset.comment: For experiments, see experiment.json for available identifiers. For datasets, see dataset.json for available identifiers.

replicate.title: Replicate
replicate.description: The experimental replicate designation for the file.

software.title: Software
software.description: The software and parameters used to generate the file.
software.comment: See software.json for available identifiers. Do not submit, value is not valid for primary data files like FastQ.

assembly.title: Mapping assembly
assembly.description: UCSC genome assembly that files were mapped to.
assembly.comment: Applies for mapped files (e.g. BAM, BED and BigWig).

submitted_file_name.title: Original file name
submitted_file_name.description: The local file name used at time of submission.
